typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		service_id as string,
		monday as string,
		tuesday as string,
		wednesday as string,
		thursday as string,
		friday as string,
		saturday as string,
		sunday as string,
		start_date as string,
		end_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DataFlowCalendersource
DataFlowCalendersource derive(start_date = toDate(substring(start_date,1,4)+"-"+substring(start_date,5,2)+"-"+substring(start_date,7,2)),
		end_date = toDate(substring(end_date,1,4)+"-"+substring(end_date,5,2)+"-"+substring(end_date,7,2))) ~> DerivedColumntoconvertstringtodate
DerivedColumntoconvertstringtodate sink(input(
		Service_id as string,
		Monday as string,
		Tuesday as string,
		Wednesday as string,
		Thursday as string,
		Friday as string,
		Saturday as string,
		Sunday as string,
		Start_date as date,
		End_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Service_id = service_id,
		Monday = monday,
		Tuesday = tuesday,
		Wednesday = wednesday,
		Thursday = thursday,
		Friday = friday,
		Saturday = saturday,
		Sunday = sunday,
		Start_date = start_date,
		End_date = end_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinktoSQLCalendar

source(output(
		service_id as string,
		date as string,
		exception_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> dataflowcalendardatessource
dataflowcalendardatessource derive(date = toDate(substring(date,1,4)+"-"+substring(date,5,2)+"-"+substring(date,7,2))) ~> DerivedColumntoconvertstringtodate
DerivedColumntoconvertstringtodate sink(input(
		Service_id as string,
		Date as date,
		Exception_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Service_id = service_id,
		Date = date,
		Exception_type = exception_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinktocalendardatesSQLtable

source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CODACSVfromADLS
CODACSVfromADLS split(like(Column_1,'0%'),
	like(Column_1,'1%'),
	like(Column_1,'2%'),
	like(Column_1,'3%'),
	like(Column_1,'8%'),
	like(Column_1,'9%'),
	like(Column_1,'4%'),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(HeaderRecord0, OldBalance1, Movement2, AdditionalInformation3, Newbalance8, TrailerRecord9, Freecommunications4, Others)
ConditionalSplit@HeaderRecord0 derive(HeaderColumn = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		Zeros = substring(Column_1,2,4),
		Creationdate = toDate("20"+substring(Column_1,10,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,8,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,6,2)),
		BankIdentificationNumber = substring(Column_1,12,3),
		ApplicationCode = substring(Column_1,15,2),
		Duplicate = substring(Column_1,17,1),
		BlankColumn1 = substring(Column_1,18,7),
		CodeSeperateApplication = substring(Column_1,84,5),
		TransactionReferrence = substring(Column_1,89,16),
		RelatedReferrence = substring(Column_1,105,16),
		BlankColumn2 = substring(Column_1,83,1),
		VersionCode = substring(Column_1,128,1),
		FileReference = substring(Column_1,25,10),
		NameAddressee = substring(Column_1,35,26),
		BIC = substring(Column_1,61,11),
		IdentificationNumberOfBelgium = substring(Column_1,72,11),
		BlankColumn3 = substring(Column_1,121,7)) ~> AssignHeaderRecords
ConditionalSplit@OldBalance1 derive({RegistrationID } = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		BankAccountType = substring(Column_1,2,1),
		Sequencenumberofpaperaccount = substring(Column_1,3,3),
		Accountnumber = substring(Column_1,6,37),
		Oldbalance = substring(Column_1,43,1),
		Oldpay = toDecimal((substring(Column_1,44,12)+"."+substring(Column_1,56,3)),15,3),
		Dateofoldbalance = toDate("20"+substring(Column_1,63,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,61,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,59,2)),
		Accountholdername = substring(Column_1,65,26),
		Accounttagged = substring(Column_1,91,35),
		{Sequencenumberofthecodified } = substring(Column_1,126,3)) ~> AssignOldBalancerecords
ConditionalSplit@Movement2 split(like(Column_1,'21%'),
	like(Column_1,'22%'),
	like(Column_1,'23%'),
	disjoint: true) ~> Movement2Split@(Movement21, Movement22, Movement23, NoMovement)
Movement2Split@Movement21 derive(RegistrationID = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		ArticleCode = substring(Column_1,2,1),
		Sequencenumber = substring(Column_1,3,4),
		Retailnumber = substring(Column_1,7,4),
		bankreferencenumber = substring(Column_1,11,21),
		Movementsign = substring(Column_1,32,1),
		Amount = iif(substring(Column_1,32,1)=="0",toDecimal(("+"+substring(Column_1,33,12)+"."+substring(Column_1,45,3)),15,3),toDecimal(("-"+substring(Column_1,33,12)+"."+substring(Column_1,45,3)),15,3)),
		{Valuedate } = toDate("20"+substring(Column_1,52,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,50,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,48,2)),
		OperationCode = substring(Column_1,54,8),
		communicationtype = substring(Column_1,62,1),
		Communicationzone = substring(Column_1,63,53),
		{Accountdate } = toDate("20"+substring(Column_1,120,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,118,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,116,2)),
		{Sequencenumberofpaperaccount } = substring(Column_1,122,3),
		Codeglobalization = substring(Column_1,125,1),
		Codesuite = substring(Column_1,126,1),
		BlankColumn = substring(Column_1,127,1),
		Linkcode = substring(Column_1,128,1)) ~> Assign21Columns
Movement2Split@Movement22 derive(RegistrationID = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		ArticleCode = substring(Column_1,2,1),
		Sequencenumber = substring(Column_1,3,4),
		Retailnumber = substring(Column_1,7,4),
		Communication = substring(Column_1,11,53),
		Customerreference = substring(Column_1,64,35),
		BIC = substring(Column_1,99,11),
		BlankColumn1 = substring(Column_1,110,3),
		Transactiontype = substring(Column_1,113,1),
		ISOCode = substring(Column_1,114,4),
		CategoryPurpose = substring(Column_1,118,4),
		Purpose = substring(Column_1,122,4),
		MoreCode = substring(Column_1,126,1),
		BlankColumn2 = substring(Column_1,127,1),
		Linkcode = substring(Column_1,128,1)) ~> Assign22Columns
Movement2Split@Movement23 derive(RegistrationID = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		ArticleCode = substring(Column_1,2,1),
		Sequencenumber = substring(Column_1,3,4),
		Retailnumber = substring(Column_1,7,4),
		Counterpartyaccountnumber = substring(Column_1,11,37),
		Nameofcounterparty = substring(Column_1,48,35),
		Communication = substring(Column_1,83,43),
		SuiteCode = substring(Column_1,126,1),
		BlankColumn = substring(Column_1,127,1),
		Linkcode = substring(Column_1,128,1)) ~> Assign23Columns
ConditionalSplit@AdditionalInformation3 split(like(Column_1,'31%'),
	like(Column_1,'32%'),
	like(Column_1,'33%'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(AdditionalInformation31, AdditionalInformation32, AdditionalInformation33, NoMatching)
ConditionalSplit1@AdditionalInformation31 derive(RegistrationID = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		ArticleCode = substring(Column_1,2,1),
		Sequencenumber = substring(Column_1,3,4),
		Retailnumber = substring(Column_1,7,4),
		AdditionalInformation = substring(Column_1,11,21),
		OperationCode = substring(Column_1,32,8),
		CommunicationCode = substring(Column_1,40,1),
		Communication = substring(Column_1,41,73),
		BlankColumn1 = substring(Column_1,114,12),
		MoreCode = substring(Column_1,126,1),
		BlankColumn2 = substring(Column_1,127,1),
		LinkCode = substring(Column_1,128,1)) ~> AssignColumn31
ConditionalSplit1@AdditionalInformation32 derive(RegistrationID = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		ArticleCode = substring(Column_1,2,1),
		Sequencenumber = substring(Column_1,3,4),
		Retailnumber = substring(Column_1,7,4),
		Communication = substring(Column_1,11,105),
		BlankColumn1 = substring(Column_1,116,10),
		Codesuite = substring(Column_1,126,1),
		BlankColumn2 = substring(Column_1,127,1),
		LinkCode = substring(Column_1,128,1)) ~> AssignColumn32
ConditionalSplit1@AdditionalInformation33 derive(RegistrationID = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		ArticleCode = substring(Column_1,2,1),
		Sequencenumber = substring(Column_1,3,4),
		Retailnumber = substring(Column_1,7,4),
		Communication = substring(Column_1,11,90),
		BlankColumn1 = substring(Column_1,101,25),
		Codesuite = substring(Column_1,126,1),
		BlankColumn2 = substring(Column_1,127,1),
		LinkCode = substring(Column_1,128,1)) ~> Assigncolumn33
ConditionalSplit@Newbalance8 derive({RegistrationID } = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		Sequencenumber = substring(Column_1,2,3),
		Accountnumber = substring(Column_1,5,37),
		SignCode = substring(Column_1,42,1),
		NewBalance = toDecimal((substring(Column_1,43,12)+"."+substring(Column_1,55,3)),15,3),
		{Dateofnewbalance } = toDate("20"+substring(Column_1,62,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,60,2)+"-"+substring(Column_1,58,2)),
		BlankColumn = substring(Column_1,64,64),
		LinkCode = substring(Column_1,128,1)) ~> AssignColumn8
ConditionalSplit@TrailerRecord9 derive(RegistrationID = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		BlankColumn1 = substring(Column_1,2,15),
		Numberofrecords = substring(Column_1,17,6),
		DebitRevenue = toDecimal((substring(Column_1,23,12)+"."+substring(Column_1,35,3)),15,3),
		CreditSales = toDecimal((substring(Column_1,38,12)+"."+substring(Column_1,50,3)),15,3),
		BlankColumn2 = substring(Column_1,53,75),
		Multiplefilecode = substring(Column_1,128,1)) ~> AssignColumn9
ConditionalSplit@Freecommunications4 derive(RegistrationID = substring(Column_1,1,1),
		BlankColumn1 = substring(Column_1,2,1),
		Sequencenumber = substring(Column_1,3,4),
		Retailnumber = substring(Column_1,7,4),
		BlankColumn2 = substring(Column_1,11,22),
		Textofthefreemessage = substring(Column_1,33,80),
		BlankColumn3 = substring(Column_1,113,15),
		LinkCode = substring(Column_1,128,1)) ~> AssignColumn4
AssignHeaderRecords sink(input(
		RecordIdentification as string,
		Zeros as string,
		CreationDate as date,
		BankIdentificationNumber as string,
		ApplicationCode as string,
		Duplicate as string,
		BlankColumn1 as string,
		FileReference as string,
		NameAddressee as string,
		BIC as string,
		IdentificationNumberofBelgium as string,
		BlankColumn2 as string,
		CodeSeperateApplication as string,
		TransactionReferrence as string,
		RelatedReferrence as string,
		BlankColumn3 as string,
		VersionCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['DELETE FROM [dbo].[COD-0]'],
	mapColumn(
		RecordIdentification = HeaderColumn,
		Zeros,
		CreationDate = Creationdate,
		BankIdentificationNumber,
		ApplicationCode,
		Duplicate,
		BlankColumn1,
		FileReference,
		NameAddressee,
		BIC,
		IdentificationNumberofBelgium = IdentificationNumberOfBelgium,
		BlankColumn2,
		CodeSeperateApplication,
		TransactionReferrence,
		RelatedReferrence,
		BlankColumn3,
		VersionCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLCODA0
AssignOldBalancerecords sink(input(
		RegistrationID as string,
		BankAccountType as string,
		Sequencenumberofpaperaccount as string,
		Accountnumber as string,
		Oldbalance as string,
		Oldpay as decimal(15,3),
		Dateofoldbalance as date,
		Accountholdername as string,
		Accounttagged as string,
		Sequencenumberofthecodified as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['\nDELETE FROM [dbo].[COD-1]'],
	mapColumn(
		RegistrationID = {RegistrationID },
		BankAccountType,
		Sequencenumberofpaperaccount,
		Accountnumber,
		Oldbalance,
		Oldpay,
		Dateofoldbalance,
		Accountholdername,
		Accounttagged,
		Sequencenumberofthecodified = {Sequencenumberofthecodified }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkCODA1
Assign21Columns sink(input(
		RegistrationID as string,
		ArticleCode as string,
		Sequencenumber as string,
		Retailnumber as string,
		bankreferencenumber as string,
		Movementsign as string,
		Amount as decimal(15,3),
		Valuedate as date,
		OperationCode as string,
		communicationtype as string,
		Communicationzone as string,
		Accountdate as date,
		Sequencenumberofpaperaccount as string,
		Codeglobalization as string,
		Codesuite as string,
		BlankColumn as string,
		Linkcode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['DELETE FROM [dbo].[COD-21]'],
	mapColumn(
		RegistrationID,
		ArticleCode,
		Sequencenumber,
		Retailnumber,
		bankreferencenumber,
		Movementsign,
		Amount,
		Valuedate = {Valuedate },
		OperationCode,
		communicationtype,
		Communicationzone,
		Accountdate = {Accountdate },
		Sequencenumberofpaperaccount = {Sequencenumberofpaperaccount },
		Codeglobalization,
		Codesuite,
		BlankColumn,
		Linkcode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkCODA21
Assign22Columns sink(input(
		RegistrationID as string,
		ArticleCode as string,
		Sequencenumber as string,
		Retailnumber as string,
		Communication as string,
		Customerreference as string,
		BIC as string,
		BlankColumn1 as string,
		Transactiontype as string,
		ISOCode as string,
		CategoryPurpose as string,
		Purpose as string,
		MoreCode as string,
		BlankColumn2 as string,
		Linkcode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['DELETE FROM [dbo].[COD-22]'],
	mapColumn(
		RegistrationID,
		ArticleCode,
		Sequencenumber,
		Retailnumber,
		Communication,
		Customerreference,
		BIC,
		BlankColumn1,
		Transactiontype,
		ISOCode,
		CategoryPurpose,
		Purpose,
		MoreCode,
		BlankColumn2,
		Linkcode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkCODA22
Assign23Columns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['DELETE FROM [dbo].[COD-23]'],
	mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		RegistrationID,
		ArticleCode,
		Sequencenumber,
		Retailnumber,
		Counterpartyaccountnumber,
		Nameofcounterparty,
		Communication,
		SuiteCode,
		BlankColumn,
		Linkcode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkCODA23
AssignColumn31 sink(input(
		RegistrationID as string,
		ArticleCode as string,
		Sequencenumber as string,
		Retailnumber as string,
		AdditionalInformation as string,
		OperationCode as string,

		Communication,
		BlankColumn1,
		MoreCode,
		BlankColumn2,
		LinkCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkCODA31

		RegistrationID as string,
		ArticleCode as string,

		Retailnumber as string,
		Communication as string,

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,

		Sequencenumber,
		Retailnumber,

		Codesuite,

	),

		Retailnumber as string,
		Communication as string,

	),

AssignColumn8 sink(input(
		RegistrationID as string,
		Sequencenumber as string,
		Accountnumber as string,
		SignCode as string,
		NewBalance as decimal(15,3),

		Sequencenumber,

		SignCode,
		NewBalance,
		Dateofnewbalance = {Dateofnewbalance },
		BlankColumn,
		LinkCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkCODA8
AssignColumn9 sink(input(
		RegistrationID as string,
		BlankColumn1 as string,
		Numberofrecords as string,
		DebitRevenue as decimal(15,3),
		CreditSales as decimal(15,3),

		BlankColumn2,
		Textofthefreemessage,
		BlankColumn3,
		LinkCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1CODA4

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT Top(100)
     E003.Code_segment
    ,E003.Poste_segment
    ,E003.Id_transaction
    ,E001.Num_serie
    ,E002.Id_entreprise
    ,E003.Id_paiement
    ,E003.Code_moyen_paiement
    ,E003.Sens_paiement
    ,E003.Montant
    ,10 AS Type_Eqiupment
    ,E001.Date_ope
    ,E000.Plateforme
	,NEWID() AS Unique_Id
  FROM [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_001] E001
  LEFT JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_002] E002
    ON E001.Id_transaction = E002.Id_transaction
  JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_003] E003
    ON E001.Id_transaction = E003.Id_transaction
  JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_000] E000
    ON E000.Code_segment = '000'
  ORDER by E001.id_transaction

activities.name: Copy data to Agency SQL Table
